cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.SY 

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of predicting binary sequences and optimizing regret trade-offs, which are topics that are commonly studied in the fields of information theory (cs.IT), machine learning (cs.LG), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of differential equations to obtain the optimal payoff functions suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the field of dynamical systems (cs.DS) and control theory (cs.SY).
